wikipedia_page.main: Frank Jackett (5 July 1927 – 14 April 2010) was a Welsh professional footballer who played as a wing half.

response: Jackett is the son of professional footballer Frank Jackett, who played for Watford between 1949 and 1953. His son Ryan was appointed caretaker manager of Kings Langley in September 2019.
